PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2001-11152001-06-140,  ,  CCRA,  , 
PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS by raising the deduction limit on scholarships, updating cross-references to the Income Tax Act in various sections dealing with RRSPs, changing the way payroll deductions on commissions are calculated, introducing standardized deduction rates for bonuses, and by updating the payroll deduction tables.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2001-0221 Publication Date: 2001-07-04
